remarks: Lemma for ~ nobndup and ~ nobnddown .  Given an element ` A ` of ` F ` , then the first position where it differs from ` X ` is strictly less than ` C ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Aug-2011.)
statement:
nobndlem6.1 $e |- X e. { 1o , 2o } $.
nobndlem6.2 $e |- C = |^| { a e. On | A. n e. F E. b e. a ( n ` b ) =/= X } $.
nobndlem6 $p |- ( ( F C_ No /\ A e. F ) -> |^| { x e. On | ( A ` x ) =/= X } e. C ) $.
$d A a b n $.
$d A a b x $.
$d F a b n $.
$d X a b n $.
$d X a b x $.
